title: 11 Funny Quotes On Death To Help You Understand It's Not Something You Need To Fear
text:
11 Funny Quotes On Death To Help You Understand It's Not Something You Need To Fear

11 Funny Quotes On Death To Help You Understand It's Not Something You Need To Fear

If we ask people what they fear the most, most people will say death. Even the thought of it is scary but have you ever considered that it is also something that'll set you free? No more stress of earning more or getting your heart broken.

To feel a little more differently about death as a topic, here are some funny quotes:
